text: Clocental (dolcental) is a carbamate-derived sedative hypnotic. It can be prepared by the ethynylation of cyclohexanone followed by reaction with allophanyl chloride.Grimme, Walter; Emde, Hans (1957 to Rheinpreussen) Clocental synthesis ==See also== * 1-Ethynylcyclohexanol * Methylpentynol ==References== Category:Alkyne derivatives Category:Carbamates Category:Hypnotics Category:Sedatives Category:GABAA receptor positive allosteric modulators
title: Clocental
